EmailTemplate.name: Z 2015 Financial Service Professional
EmailTemplate.subject: You are a candidate for the 2015 Five Star Financial Service Professional Award!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
You have been identified as a candidate for the 2015 Five Star Financial Service Professionals award! An exclusive group of financial professionals (including CPAs, estate planning attorneys, insurance professionals and financial planners) will receive the 2015 award and be featured at no cost in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
As a candidate, we need additional information in order to evaluate you based on our 10 objective criteria and move you forward in the research process. The deadline for submission is 11:59 PM Eastern Time on {!Opportunity.CloseDate}.
To submit your information, please go to the secure, online link below and complete the form questionnaire. This only takes a few minutes of your time to complete.
Please click here to complete your candidate form.
Evaluation Process: Candidates will be evaluated on 10 criteria aligned with providing quality service to clients. Only those candidates who differentiate themselves based on the criteria will be named a 2015 Five Star Financial Service Professional. Our 10 evaluative criteria include client retention rates, education and professional designations, a consumer complaint history review, industry board certifications and six other important criteria.
Award winners are scheduled to be notified 4-6 weeks after the deadline date posted above.
{!User.Name} Research Representative
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} http://www.fivestarprofessional.com
We exist to define and promote professional excellence.
